languages.text: "Подобная горячность не доводит до добра... но {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} благоволит к тебе". {n}Эдельтрад оглядывает вас еще раз.{/n} "И все же — твои раны внушают мне беспокойство".

traits.locale_text: "Подобная горячность не доводит до добра... но {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} благоволит к тебе". {n}Эдельтрад оглядывает вас еще раз.{/n} "И все же — твои раны внушают мне беспокойство".

languages.text: "Nothing good ever comes of such rashness... yet it appears that the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} favours you." {n}Edelthrad examines you once more.{/n} "Be that as it may, your wounds are highly worrying."
languages.original_text: "Подобная горячность не доводит до добра... но {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Император{/g} благоволит к тебе". {n}Эдельтрад оглядывает вас еще раз.{/n} "И все же — твои раны внушают мне беспокойство".

traits.locale_text: "Nothing good ever comes of such rashness... yet it appears that the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} favours you." {n}Edelthrad examines you once more.{/n} "Be that as it may, your wounds are highly worrying."

"Nothing good ever comes of such rashness... yet it appears that the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} favours you." {n}Edelthrad examines you once more.{/n} "Be that as it may, your wounds are highly worrying."

"Nothing good ever comes of such rashness... yet it appears that the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} favours you." {n}Edelthrad examines you once more.{/n} "Be that as it may, your wounds are highly worrying."

"Nothing good ever comes of such rashness... yet it appears that the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} favours you." {n}Edelthrad examines you once more.{/n} "Be that as it may, your wounds are highly worrying."

"Nothing good ever comes of such rashness... yet it appears that the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} favours you." {n}Edelthrad examines you once more.{/n} "Be that as it may, your wounds are highly worrying."

languages.text: “这种鲁莽之举是不会带来任何好处的……不过，{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}似乎对你青睐有加。{n}艾德萨德再次看着你。{/n}“尽管如此，你的伤势还是令人非常担心。”
languages.original_text: "Nothing good ever comes of such rashness... yet it appears that the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} favours you." {n}Edelthrad examines you once more.{/n} "Be that as it may, your wounds are highly worrying."

traits.locale_text: “这种鲁莽之举是不会带来任何好处的……不过，{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}似乎对你青睐有加。{n}艾德萨德再次看着你。{/n}“尽管如此，你的伤势还是令人非常担心。”

languages.text: «Las prisas nunca conducen a nada bueno... pero parece que el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} l{mf|e|a} favorece». {n}Edelthrad te examina una vez más.{/n} «Aun así, sus heridas me resultan muy preocupantes».
languages.original_text: "Nothing good ever comes of such rashness... yet it appears that the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} favours you." {n}Edelthrad examines you once more.{/n} "Be that as it may, your wounds are highly worrying."

traits.locale_text: «Las prisas nunca conducen a nada bueno... pero parece que el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} l{mf|e|a} favorece. {n}Edelthrad te examina una vez más.{/n} «Aun así, sus heridas me resultan muy preocupantes».

languages.text: 「そんな無謀からは何も良いものは生まれない…それでも{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}はあなたを大切にしているようだね」{n}エデルスラドがもう一度あなたを調べる。{/n}「それにしても、あなたの傷がとても心配だ」
languages.original_text: "Nothing good ever comes of such rashness... yet it appears that the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} favours you." {n}Edelthrad examines you once more.{/n} "Be that as it may, your wounds are highly worrying."

traits.locale_text: 「そんな無謀からは何も良いものは生まれません…それでも{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}はあなたを大切にしているようですね。」{n}エデルスラドがもう一度あなたを調べる。{/n}「それにしても、あなたの傷はとても心配です。」
「そんな無謀からは何も良いものは生まれない…それでも{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}はあなたを大切にしているようだね」{n}エデルスラドがもう一度あなたを調べる。{/n}「それにしても、あなたの傷がとても心配だ」

languages.text: « La précipitation n'apporte jamais rien de bon... mais vous semblez bénéficier de la faveur de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}. Malgré tout, vos blessures sont diablement inquiétantes, » {n}ajoute Edelthrad en vous examinant à nouveau.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Nothing good ever comes of such rashness... yet it appears that the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} favours you." {n}Edelthrad examines you once more.{/n} "Be that as it may, your wounds are highly worrying."

traits.locale_text: « La précipitation n'apporte jamais rien de bon... mais vous semblez bénéficier de la faveur de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}. Malgré tout, vos blessures sont diablement inquiétantes, » {n}ajoute Edelthrad en vous examinant à nouveau.{/n}

languages.text: "Übereiltes Vorgehen ist selten von Vorteil ... dennoch scheint Euch die Gunst des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} hold zu sein." {n}Edelthrad mustert dich erneut.{/n} "Wie auch immer, Eure Wunden sind sehr beunruhigend."
languages.original_text: "Nothing good ever comes of such rashness... yet it appears that the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} favours you." {n}Edelthrad examines you once more.{/n} "Be that as it may, your wounds are highly worrying."

traits.locale_text: "Übereiltes Vorgehen ist selten von Vorteil ... dennoch scheint Euch die Gunst des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} hold zu sein." {n}Edelthrad mustert dich erneut.{/n} "Wie auch immer, Eure Wunden sind sehr beunruhigend."

languages.text: "Böylesi gözü karalıktan genelde hayır gelmez ama... Gördüğüm kadarıyla {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} kutsamış seni." {n}Edelthrad, seni bir kez daha inceliyor.{/n} "Tüm bunlara rağmen yaraların beni ziyadesiyle kaygılandırıyor."
languages.original_text: "Nothing good ever comes of such rashness... yet it appears that the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} favours you." {n}Edelthrad examines you once more.{/n} "Be that as it may, your wounds are highly worrying."

traits.locale_text: "Böylesi gözü karalıktan genelde hayır gelmez ama... Gördüğüm kadarıyla {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g} kutsamış seni." {n}Edelthrad, seni bir kez daha inceliyor.{/n} "Tüm bunlara rağmen yaraların beni ziyadesiyle kaygılandırıyor."

languages.original_text: "Nothing good ever comes of such rashness... yet it appears that the Emperor favours you." {n}Edelthrad examines you once more.{/n} "Be that as it may, your wounds are highly worrying."
